ProcessTreeType.description: The ProcessTreeType captures the process tree for the malware instance, including the parent process and processes spawned by it, along with any Actions initiated by each.

allOf.description: The ProcessTreeNodeType captures a single process, or node, in the process tree. It imports and extends the ProcessObjectType from the CybOX Process Object.

initiated_actions.description: The Initiated_Actions field captures, via references, the actions (found inside the top-level Actions element, or an Action Collection inside the top-level Collections element) initiated by the Process.

spawned_process.description: The Spawned_Process field captures a single child process spawned by this process.

injected_process.description: The Injected_Process field captures a single process that was injected by this process.

id.description: The required id field specifies a unique ID for the Process Node.

parent_action_idref.description: The parent_action_idref field specifies the id of the action that created or injected this process.

ordinal_position.description: The ordinal_position field specifies the ordinal position of the process with respect to the other processes spawned or injected by the malware.

ProcessTreeReferenceType.description: The ProcessTreeReferenceType captures a reference to an existing Process Tree defined in the MAEC document.

process_tree_idref.description: The required process_tree_idref field references an existing Process Tree defined in the MAEC document, via its ID
